website_summaries.verdict: For intermediate gamers who want to eventually add more internal components.
pros: Good price for speedy processor and responsive graphics card
Comes with a USB WiFi adapter (no internal WiFi)
Room to add memory, a PCI card and a hard drive
cons: Can overheat during long sessions of newer games on higher settings

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Can you stream on it? - Yes, very well actually. How high can you run games? - So far I've been able to run it on high on /everything/ AND stream. League of Legends, CSGO, Fortnite, Overwatch, and numerous other games. Only complaint is the computer is basically a small heat generator, it does make my room very hot. Good thing about that, winter is coming! Downside, Summer time is going to suck :'-) But yes, for the price, I highly recommend this. I love this so much, it's my second Cyberpower PC I've bought x
customer_reviews.author: Paige Nicole Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value gaming PC.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this PC for my son. He immediately fell in love with the red/black color scheme and light up fans. Fired up a few games and they run awesome! This thing rips up most games on MAX settings at 1080. I plan on adding a 2nd stick of ram so it will run in dual channel mode and maybe add some Optane memory. Also because this system has and AMD RX580 it qualifies for the RAISE THE GAME promotion. Amazon sent me the promo code several days later and i was able to redeem it for 3 free games, Assassins Creed Odyssey, Strange Brigade, and Star Control Origins. What an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: IMA_Redneck

customer_reviews.title: Worst Customer Service Ever
customer_reviews.text: First written Review. I contacted CyberPower PC tech support and they never replied or tried to help at all with this PC. Don't buy from them if you think you'll get some kind of customer service if you run into an issue with this; which mostly likely will happen if you want to upgrade RAM or other components. I wish there was less than a star review. They wouldn't even have deserved it. This makes Amazon look really bad. I'll definitely think more than twice next time.
customer_reviews.author: Dro

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, build your own.
customer_reviews.text: The PC worked great for the first few days until the graphics card starting showing signs of damage. I usually put my own computers together, but when I saw this PC for $650 during the bitcoin/GPU crisis...how could you not? My impression of prebuilt PCs had always been the same. I knew that prebuilt computers were always terrible and I should've known better than to purchase this. The RX580 has officially died in my PC as of yesterday after 4 months, and the computer is essentially a brick. Now I have to call cyberpower and probably send my computer away for a few months for warranty, OR I'll have to put $350 in for a new GPU.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: died in one day
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, Horrible, horrible. Extremely disappointed. I've built my own computers for as long as I can remember. I wanted to get a gaming pc for my 11-year-old son. Hooked this up and died on day 2. Save yourself the money and stay away from this I power supply died on day 2 luckily I was able to replace it myself. I have no idea what customer service is like since I didn't report to them extremely angry that I would have to take a computer apart that I just bought brand new. Good luck if you do business with these folks.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this pc Ive had nothing but problems since I bought it. I replaced the power supply with a better one the one that came with it was not labeled. Constant frame skipping in games. Tech support wants me to send it in but they want to charge for the power supply I replaced and pay shipping there and back even though they agree the power supply isnt the issue. Constant fan errors but all fans are running at suggested rpm. PC worked great for a month now barely plays anything. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy McClendon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STARTER PC
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 14 year old for Christmas. Easy and fast set up, right out the box. Great starter pc for anyone who is thinking about converting over from console to pc. If my son prefers PC over Console, then i will upgrade the ram and ssd. Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Ace one

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great PC to have in your home
customer_reviews.text: I love this Computer so far. I have had it for a week. I have had no issues. The packaging came in really good condition. Everything looks nicely done. No issues whatsoever. I have been wanting that next level gaming experience without breaking my wallet. For under 800$ you can’t get anything better. And from what I’ve heard it’s hard to get a better deal these days. Update - the price dropped 50$ a week after purchasing. So wait until it’s 729$. Not 779$ like me unfortunately. Lost 1 star for that 50$ I missed out on.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiance and he loves it. His game play is much smoother and he can do a lot more than he could on his old computer. It is much quieter than most computers and he doesn't even hear it running no matter what game he's playing. He gave me the mouse and keyboard with it. He was surprised that the mouse wasn't as cheaply made like some come with computers and I haven't had any problems with it falling apart or anything. I also like the buttons being higher than other keyboards I've used but that's just personal preference. This was definitely worth the price and I'm glad I invested in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this computer! 🥰
customer_reviews.text: Update August 2020: I use this PC 5-6 says a week for telehealth Zoom calls (up to 70 a day). It has been nearly perfect thus far. I think I he speaker port may have died, but I use USB speakers now and couldn't be happier. I'm running four monitors off the vidio port with an adapter. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Original review: I originally bought this computer for stock trading. It has worked well. I called tech support and they were awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Brain_Sick_Monkey

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier with this system
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I couldn't be happier with this system. The performance is great. The 4 gig 580 allows my son to be on the max settings on Fortnite, me to do War simulation games at the highest setting and still get 125+ FPS. I am going to call them and ask them for guidance on installing an SSD in it as well. The red lights are not overly bright and don't disturb by play of working on other apps. Well worth the price. When you compared units with similar prices, none of the video cards are rated this well. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son as a graduation present in June. I always built my own but for the price it was worth buying a prebuilt. He uses it every day and has been a great gaming pc. We added an additional 8gb of ram as Call of Duty Black OPs 4 was not running super smooth but after that it's been great. He plays ARK, Fortnight, Call of Duty Black Ops 4, and a bunch of other games and they play great. The front cover of the case seems very restrictive and we plan on doing some mods to improve air flow, but otherwise it has been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Butch K

customer_reviews.title: This is a very great starting computer for any gamer.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first gaming PC to ever own and this thing is a beast. I recently added another 2 ram sticks for streaming but this PC can handle the best game while still doing well over 60 frames on high settings. I personally play a lot of Modern Warfare and I ran 120 FPS on normal settings before buying my RAM sticks which allowed me to run 143 FPS. I would highly recommend this PC to you if your starting with your first one like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, awesome starter PC
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a long time to find a PC that would be worth my money. This one kept popping up and I finally caved and I am so glad that I did. It works great. I'm running a variety of games and they are all working flawlessly. I'm getting around 100 frames on games like PUBG on their very highest settings. I would definitely recommend. My only complaint is that I wish it had more RAM, but that is quite an easy fix that I am happy to do when the PC was priced so well.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Gullickson

customer_reviews.title: Great and powerful gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pc for about a half a year now and I can honestly say that it was totally worth it, I was skeptical about it at first, due to the negative feedback from some of people who reviewed this pc in the past. But I guess I'm one of the lucky ones who didn't get a defective system. It's able to withstand any game out there,And it looks amazing on my 4k TV. 5⭐'s
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first computer Ive ever bought and i love it!! Its awesome, stylish, big fan of the red lights, I played fortnite on my playstation and decided to upgrade to PC. The graphics and design of this PC are unbelievable better!! This is the perfect beginner pc for someone on a budget!! Also came wit a free gaming keyboard and mouse that I really needed and enjoy it!! I 100% recommend cyberpower gaming PC!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary G Wilburn

customer_reviews.title: Limited features
customer_reviews.text: There are several issues here. First, no DVD, no card storage readers. The graphics card is huge and takes up to much space. Making one serial connection un-useable. I tried to add a portable DVD player. Couldn't get it to work on the back terminals, it only worked in one of the two front panel 3.0 terminals. Otherwise, I have had no problems. The keyboad provides lots of control.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Constantly restarts itself after gaming for just a few hours
customer_reviews.text: Constantly overheats and automatically reboots itself just for playing games like Overwatch for a few hours on a moderate 70 degree Fahrenheit day. Fans are also extremely loud, and even with the front case popped open to allow more ventilation it will still shut itself down and restart after only a few hours of gaming. No the computer is not filled with dust. I have to point an additional fan at the computer just to make sure it doesn’t overheat and shut itself down while playing again...
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Computer with Other Uses
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good game computer, especially for the price. It's a great value. It came with a Microsft set of programs for word processing, spreadsheet, etc.) and is useful for most everyday tasks; so the computer is versatile. It is also a very good looking computer with a mouse and keyboard of matching decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best PC I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, I'm not much of a "PC Gamer". However, I wanted something to use for music production. With of course, the capability for gaming. This PC has amazing specs when it comes to music production, and it didn't cost me an arm and a leg! Most people I talk to say they've spent $1000+ on a "decent" production PC. This one definitely fits the bill! Also, according to most benchmarks I've ran, it seems to run every game I want it to! Can't wait to see what wonders await in the world of PC gaming!
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Clumb

customer_reviews.title: Biggest waste of my money to date
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but problems with this computer, tech support was not helpful. Windows is always at 100% disk usage regardless of what's actually being used, the GPU was fried within three months, and it sounds like a gen one Xbox 360 with how loud it is. I thought it was dirty or something inside because typically a GPU frying and a loud fan is signs of poor air circulation, but no. If I could return it this late I would.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mack

customer_reviews.title: stopped working, wifi problems from the start
customer_reviews.text: From the beginning, I was having problems connecting to my Wi-fi so I bought another Wi-fi USB adapter because I thought that would fix the problem. Still cannot connect to wifi, after ive tried all the solutions offered on YouTube. Now computer wont even boot up, stuck on the arsenal gaming screen. And I havent been using the computer a lot, maybe once or twice a week. I think it would be smarter to go with a brand name PC, not this cyberpower second hand garbage. $1000 down the drain...
customer_reviews.author: Noori Kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine For The Casual Gamer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a heavy gamer and didn't want to sink a lot of money into something I wouldn't use as much as other folks probably do. This is probably the nicest machine I have ever owned. Very quiet and set up was easy. I did have a tiny bit of drama connecting the monitor as I have never had a machine use a DVI-D connection but that was resolved with ease. Super fast and came with almost no bloatware. Very sleek and looks super cool with the red illumination. Their tech support is also really helpful. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not have a disc drive or bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This the best computer I've ever had but that is only because I am cheap and never spend real money on PCs. Easy to set up. Just make sure you plug the ethernet cords in the correct slots. I was cursing to the high heavens when it wouldn't work because I did not follow directions. Plays the Sims 4/Resident Evil/Tomb Raider and a bunch of other PC Games pretty well. No lag. Excellent graphics. I had to buy a bluetooth dongle separately and I guess I will buy a disc reader if necessary. It is a little loud but it doesn't bother me since I sleep with a fan which is already loud. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: dini

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Rig but hot deal!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been purchasing cyberpowers for years so when it was time to upgrade it was a no-brainer to snag this when the deal was hot. This computer is QUIET! If it weren't for the lights I don't think I would even know its running. It does get warm playing World of Warcraft especially during LFR or other raids but I have yet to need to take the cover off. Super easy to set up as well. I suspect I'll get a solid 5+ years out of this before I need to start considering upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Its quick and responsive and the fans are whisper quiet. I have noticed it can start to run a little hot during some heavy gaming and think it could benefit from a better exhaust fan, there just doesn't seem to feel like much air being pushed out the back. My only real complaint is not having an option to turn off the fan LEDs. Id just rather they not be on all the time, especially the 3 in the front. Love the computer though!
customer_reviews.author: AEF

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: "Assembly" was almost as easy as turning on a computer, which is part of what I paid for here. That was great. Also, it has run every game I've put up to it including Guild Wars 2, Worlds Adrift, World of Warcraft, etc. Haven't noticed any problem with the fans being too loud. I enjoy the terrabyte harddrive storage because I do data science projects at home sometimes. I would recommend this PC to others!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hebert

customer_reviews.title: This computer runs great. The mouse and keyboard are ok
customer_reviews.text: This computer runs great. The mouse and keyboard are ok. I have better ones so i didnt really use them. It would have been better if it had 16gb(2x8gb) of ram instead of a single stick of 8gb. It runs everything smoothly. about 80-90FPS on PUBG. I dont have a VR system yet so i couldnt try it out. It does get hot, i removed the front cover to help air flow. It comes with a 1tb HDD. It would have been nice if it came with ssd. Everything was easy to set up. Just plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: gamerZzz

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my 11 years old son and he loves it. He uses it to play Fortnite, Dota 2, Overwatch and more and the computer can handle all of them with no problem. I was thinking to build a computer on my own but after checking the cost of each of the components I realized that this computer is the best for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Doron Gal

customer_reviews.title: So far, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this computer for 4 days but I love it. My husband has been gaming on it and says it runs games perfectly on the highest graphics settings. I had an issue with Windows not activating like it was supposed to but customer service helped me solve the problem via email within 24 hours. I will update if anything changes but so far, it seems like an amazing computer for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha M. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Good Computer; very fast, wifi drive is a bit slow, but easy upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Originally, the product was delayed, but that doesn't matter; its finally here! Everything seems to be in working order. The WiFi card that comes with the computer (very generous, might I add) is a bit slow; but this can easily be fixed with a new WiFi card. The keyboard lights up, which is a nice addition, and the mouse has many benefits. The computer runs fast, and looks even cooler. Originally I was worried that the case would be an eyesore, but it fits well. In total, the computer is great for a gamer who isnt willing to spend $1000+ on a gaming rig. Powerful Gaming for a Cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been an excellent investment. It came super fast in the mail and i was so excited to play it. The color scheme is so good on it. Highly recommend this for anyone looking to start playing PC games. If you are an Overwatch fan such as myself just know that the game does make your GPU run at 100% so you might be a little alarmed at first over the sudden change in temperature but all you gotta do is change the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PC
customer_reviews.text: Originally I purchased an HP, but as soon as I applied the 1803 patch to it, it would refuse to boot. 3 replacements later with each one doing the same thing led me to demanding a refund and purchasing this unit. It has upgraded and worked flawlessly. It is very quiet and the LEDs are not too bright. The only reason I marked one star down on versatility is because there is a ton of room inside the case, but no cage that could be used for installing additional hard or optical drives. Other than that, it is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hawks

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop - 4 months in.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday present to myself June of this year and it has definitely not let me down! Web browsing, movie streaming, high res gaming - It has yet to let me down and has actually exceeded my initial expectations. It is super quiet. I don't think I've ever noticed any sound coming from it, which is a funny comparison to my husbands loud whirring older machine 8ft away. I had heard bad things about the mouse and keyboard that came with it, but I've been happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Dumont

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, this came pretty quickly and it was set up all nice and perfectly, ready out of the box and on top of that cheaper than any other gaming rig I could find that plays modern games! It plays Overwatch with no stutter on Ultra and is capable of streaming in HD as well, The people at CyberPower our heaven sends, since I been playing on a Pentium for a few years. Oh boy was this a great upgrade.. It's also very quiet and has neat lights on it! If you're looking for a budget Rig that'll play modern games and won't become obsolete right away, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: D. Steltz

customer_reviews.title: The quality of this PC is top notch
customer_reviews.text: First time trying A high-end PC desktop like this one. The speed of the system is awesome the graphics card is great. You can play just about any game on this pc without a problem. Windows 10 home works much better on the PC both higher and then a lower end PC. I recommend this PC desktop like this one. The speed of the system is awesome the graphics card is great. You can play just about any game on this PC without a problem. I recommend this PC to anyone that is in the market for playing video games.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Amazing computer, great for competitive gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this computer for almost a whole month and it is amazing. there have been no problems with the pc at all. I have two competitive games Overwatch and Fortnite. Overwatch can run 60fps on high graphics, and Fortnite can run 60fps on ultra and you might get a higher fps but I only have a monitor that can 60. I also recommend this PC for anyone who does not want to build a PC but wants to upgrade it because, in my opinion, that is what it was built for.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: This is a great starter gaming pc for anyone wanting to try out pc
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pc in august and it still runs current games extremely well at 1080p with 60+fps. competitive shooters such as siege and CS GO are why I bought this pc to fully utilize my 144hz monitor and it runs like a dream going as far as 200+fps in CS and 160+fps in siege. if you wanna dip your feet in pc gaming, then this is great value. in time add an extra 8 gigs of ram, trust it will help.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming/animating computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. It's incredibly high speed, downloaded all of my PC games quickly and loads them seamlessly with clear graphics and no lag time. This is the first computer I've owned that I have been able to run my animation software and not have the computer lag behind the system or not load it at all. This computer is a great machine for clear graphics and fast loading time for large games and complicated programs. I am very happy with my purchase of this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Daley

customer_reviews.title: A great pc for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this PC on prime day. The monitor I am running on is a Samsung U28E590D 4k monitor. This pc is a great introduction to gaming pc's. In Overwatch I constantly get over 60 Frames per Second running on the highest settings in 4K. Fortnite has a little bit more trouble, it works perfectly on high settings, but has some issues with ultra settings in 4k. The fan is pretty loud, but so far I have not had cooling issues. The Keyboard and mouse are pretty good, but I got an included mousepad around 3 weeks after I got the pc(a great mousepad though). I would recommend this pc to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Predictor92

customer_reviews.title: So far very good
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of a real "gaming PC". Not the absolute top-of-the-line in terms of features, but I don't need that level of performance (and didn't really want to pay top-of-the-line prices). But a big improvement over my generic desktop when it comes to the games I play. Price was good, too. I investigated upgrading an old DIY box and determined it wasn't cost effective compared to this machine. Nice mouse, love the scroll wheel (sometimes it's the little things).
customer_reviews.author: Keith Manter

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best PCs you can buy for this price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this PC because I was using a business laptop for everything and I wanted to get a Oculus Rift, because this is VR compatible which I loved. After some research I came across this beauty. Very nice design, and can run very detailed games with high FPS (plus it came with a keyboard and a mouse so +1 for that). When I got the Oculus, It was performed well with games like Beat Saber, and VR Chat. Overall for a first desktop gaming PC instead of a laptop, I think it was the perfect choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: CDouglas

customer_reviews.title: very happy. great price for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new PC as my laptop wasnt cutting it. Didn't need the portability so decided to get a desktop. I was thinking about building my own mid level pc with decent GPU. But this had everything i was considering for less than the cost of the components plus it arrived ready to boot in 2 days. From my research it is a nice collection of solid budget mid level components. The power supply does seem to be a question mark, but it fine for me after a first few weeks. Added a SSD myself and will throw in another 8gb of RAM soon, but given the price adding that stuff myself was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: adam r mccallum

customer_reviews.title: Best Gaming PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this gaming PC on Amazon day and I am really happy about this product. Since the moment I was opening the box, my kids where extremely happy it was a surprise for them. As a mom I won’t be able to tell you all the technical details of the PC. However, the fact that my kids are saying that the PC components are all well known brands and the keyboard and mouse are included that makes me happy knowing that the money that I spent for the PC is worth it. All I got to say is” THE BEST GAMING PC FOR THE MONEY’
customer_reviews.author: M. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Tech support is a joke
customer_reviews.text: My sons computer is barely a year old and it is having issues. I tried to call tech support and was on hold for almost 4 hours for them to tell me that I had called outside of business hours and I had to call back the next day. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: kristie dubois

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I was fairly worried about setting this computer up when I received it seeing as how I have zero computer tech experience. It was incredibly simple from setup to run time. It's very fast so far. I haven't play a graphically intense game so far but what I have played has run better than I've ever experienced. It looks great too. If the red lights bother you, it's very simple to replace them with the fan of your choosing. It's large case can certainly accommodate any sort of upgrading you may choose to do in the future as well.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely pleased with the outstanding performance that I got with this product. It is one of the best gaming PC's I have ever bought. I have had it for about 2 months now and I haven't encountered any problems with this device. The setup was surprisingly convenient and took little to no time at all. It also comes with a mouse and keyboard that I have found very enjoyable and stylish. The lighting effects on this computer are amazing, especially with the lights turned off. Overall, if you are looking for an affordable and high-performance gaming computer I would say this PC is a strong choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, but better.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived exactly as promised. Packing was excellent; set up was a breeze. I had been a bit concerned about the PSU after reading the reviews, but it came with a Thermaltake 600w PSU a well-regarded unit, and better than I expected. This was the first computer that I've bought from a non-name brand manufacturer, and so far, the experience has been excellent. Time will tell how well it stands up; so far so good...
customer_reviews.author: Lahazo

customer_reviews.title: Computer broke after 1 year. Parts are not available to fix!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer exactly one year ago for my sons 12th bday. It worked great up until last week when it powered off and never came back on. We purchased the extended warranty through SquareTrade and they scheduled a tech to come out to fix it. I received an email yesterday saying that the parts for repair are no longer available and they will only reimburse us $250. To anybody else wanting to buy this product I would say look into another computer. I am so upset losing so much money in a computer that only worked for a year and cannot be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Love this gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Love this gaming PC! Got it for myself for some summer gaming and it supports graphic intense games such as: League of Legends, Tera, Overwatch, PubG! High quality for low price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: Powerful PC worth the price !
customer_reviews.text: Love this PC plays all games at1080p 60fps at max settings or most at 2k very high or ultra at 60 & 30fps and some 4k at 30fps at high settings and its vr compatible !!!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel A

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Pc EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This PC is awesome. The looks of it are very cool with the open window and the red lights. The red and black mouse and keyboard feel really nice and look awesome. The mouse moves super smoothly. The speed of the PC is lightning quick and doesn't struggle with anything. I love every bit of it and have had no problems with it whatsoever. Very fast shipping and arrived in perfect condition. Could not be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden Hower

customer_reviews.title: Good PC
customer_reviews.text: This PC is kind of ugly to my eyes, but others may like it. It was a fantastic deal when I bought it, and I would recommend CyberPowerPC for a good enough pre-built gaming desktop. I would have liked them to include an SSD in conjunction with or as a replacement to the HDD, but the system is very easy to upgrade and I had no problem installing one myself. PC came with a single stick of 8GB RAM.
customer_reviews.author: The Lighthearted Lumberjack

customer_reviews.title: A very nice desktop
customer_reviews.text: We've had the desktop running for a few weeks and so far so good. My son says it runs all of the games he plays very well (Rainbow 6, MTG Arena, GTA V, Just Cause 3 Multi). He has had no issues and was easy to setup and get going. The key board and mouse are also very nice. The first upgrade we're talking about is more RAM. 8 GB can be a little light. But so far so good...
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Amos

customer_reviews.title: Good pc, bad cooling
customer_reviews.text: For people who are looking to start gaming on pc and play the lastest 2018 games at good settings this pc is for you but however you are going to have to upgrade your cpu cooler bc the stock cooler will not hold up when the cpu is under heavy load, the case itself is flawed in the sense that the air flow is little to none and this will result in high case temps, you can take the front panel off but then you will have a large dust intake which will make your pc maintenance high, but other than that this is a great rig
customer_reviews.author: olga z.

customer_reviews.title: Good system for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this computer for a few months now and have had no problems with it other than setting it up. Upon first set up the computer would not stay powered up long enough to even boot. The problem was the RAM was either in the wrong slot or in a defective slot. Moving into the next slot solved the problem and I haven't had an issue since. Runs most games and programs at high with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PC for gamers new to the PC scene
customer_reviews.text: The computer is easily upgrade-able with good parts for the price. Some of the pieces aren't the most up to date but it's more than capable of running most if not all games on the market right now. My biggest complaint so far is that my microphone won't register and my friend had the same issue. He resolved his issue but mine is slightly different and may be related to my current microphone. However on the plus side for writing a review and posting it they will give you a free headset! So yeah here I am doing just that.
customer_reviews.author: Ciny T. Peot

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer for several weeks now and so far it's working as expected. It plays all my games at high settings easily. The keyboard is good, it's nothing fancy but it serves its purpose. I cannot review the quality of the mouse as I'm using one I had bought previously. If this PC has one con, it's the absence of a disk drive. In 2018 it's no longer necessary but it would still be nice to have. Anyone who wants to download applications from a disk, play old disk games, download old CD music, or watch DVD movies will need to buy an external drive. I'll update this review if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S Bearden

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Runs fortnite at 60fps and 4k pixels
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Runs fortnite at 60fps and 4k pixels. The settings don't matter because it has such a high quality graphics card. The name in Amazon is a little off, the gpu is an msi 1050, not a radeon 580. The msi is better though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mihalovich

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous so far!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded the RAM to 32gigs, and bought a new NVME 2280 250gig SSD Hard Drive. Man, this thing flies! Quality parts at a great price, and I didn't have to build it, as I was planning to do. Been building my own for 15 years. Not this time. Just miss having a CD/DVD drive in case. Thanks CyberPower!!
customer_reviews.author: mmh3

customer_reviews.title: A good PC for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying my own PC, and I can honestly say it was worth the price. It runs well most of the time. (Windows Updates aren't fun, but that's not Cyberpower's fault, that's all on windows.) -and it gets the job done. I can play most of the games I like on the highest settings, and I would recommend this to folks. In fact, I did! -and I believe that friend also got the same PC, or at least the pictures they took look exactly like it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bozard

customer_reviews.title: Frame drops in games when having just one tab open like google. Not capable of streaming. Build a pc
customer_reviews.text: This pc is good for running games like fortnite, but as soon as you open discord or YouTube in the background it will begin to drop frames. Also you cannot stream on this pc, it’s not possible without having your game lag. If you get this pc know that you can build one yourself for $850, with a 1060 6GB, 16GB DDR4 and an i5-8400. I was afraid of building PC’s when I got this, now I’m returning it to now build my own pc, trust me it’s worth it, I’ll actually be able to stream.
customer_reviews.author: Yazdan Torkan

customer_reviews.title: Great basic gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: My old computer was broken and I needed a computer that was fairly cheap with basic needs for gaming. I found this computer and it had great value for the whole product compared to the individual parts sold separately. The delivery was extremely quick as I received it only a few days after ordering. The computer itself is great for a starting gaming computer as it runs smoothly with every game I play with no lag or FPS drops. It also has strong processing power which I could use for basic work on documents or spreadsheets and also for programming. Overall it is a good, strong, solid machine for a first gaming machine and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lee

customer_reviews.title: Rock-solid fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10-year old son. It's quite the upgrade from his previous computer, which was still fairly up to date. I'm impressed with the value for the money, as I was going to build a new system, but this system has all the components I'd have used, including a whopping 4GB video card, but all at much less than it would have cost to do it myself. The one weak spot seems to be the gaming mouse, as it doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ian Dacek

customer_reviews.title: Great for gamers!
customer_reviews.text: Has been the best gaming Desktop I have invested in by-far. Great quality sound and picture. Haven’t had a single issue and works absolutely amazing. Has plenty of storage space. Priced fair and shipped in a decent time.
customer_reviews.author: Julius

customer_reviews.title: ... my pc about a week ago and I absolutely love it! I run multiple games at a time ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my pc about a week ago and I absolutely love it! I run multiple games at a time at high/max settings with great frames! The only thing that I might change about this pc would be getting an upgraded power supply and possibly looking into increased cooling because the machine can get a bit hot at times when running multiple games, but that is to be expected. Overall, I love this machine and would absolutely recommend it to anyone because you cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: cassie kohli

customer_reviews.title: Started really fast and strong. Seems like it struggles now
customer_reviews.text: First PC I've ever owned. First couple months I had it was ridiculous fast on boot or launching steam. Now it is struggling to open chrome. I'm resetting the PC to see if an improvement in the experience. Otherwise once things are open it seems to run okay. BF4 on ultra has no issues rendering.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Ton of room for upgrade
customer_reviews.text: The computer came with graphic card (msi rx580) and msi motherboard powerful enough to play any high end games for anyone who are beginner to computer gaming, like Pubg, Arma 3, Fortnite etc... and a powerful cpu ( i5 gen 8th), and you can install more ram to it, 4 slots total, more fans to cool the computer. Though you should install drivers and utilities for the msi graphic card and motherboard to be able to make the clock speed on your graphic card faster, for the motherboard you can change the color in some part of the motherboard, and boost the computer faster from shutdown
customer_reviews.author: Tung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Best gaming system I have used. Came straight out of the box basically plug and play like a champ!!
customer_reviews.author: christopher lansaw

customer_reviews.title: Super fast computer for gaming
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived damaged. Sent back the same day, and the following day we received the replacement! Amazingly fast replacement. Super fast computer for gaming. Monster video card with amazing framerate. Runs super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last, can’t use anymore, no support . My grandson barely used it, and he was here in ny with me for a year, when he went back home, his computer won’t work, because he wasn’t there to do updates. That shouldn’t have happened. Poor boy is so upset, he couldn’t wait to get back home, to use it. It wasn’t cheap either.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Longo

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves playing games on it. The number keypad on the keyboard doesn’t work the greatest and types double numbers sometimes but my husband never has an issue because he doesn’t use that part!
customer_reviews.author: courtney lucas

customer_reviews.title: Solid computer, well built.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is great. I've been buying Cyberpower rigs for years and they always work great, but this one is particularly nice. The inside of the case is wide open, stays well cooled, looks GREAT, not to mention it runs current-gen games like a dream. I got this to play SOULCALIBUR VI and it runs on max settings with excellent performance. Definitely recommend this build (I got the Radeon version for the extra HDMI ports)
customer_reviews.author: May W

customer_reviews.title: good for games
customer_reviews.text: Good PC for the price, easy to set it up. Got it for gaming, art, and game programming in Unity. It works for all this. There was a problem in Windows saying it wasn't registered, but it works regardless, and dual boot with Linux easily. Stays cool and fairly quiet, nice that it includes a keyboard and mouse.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Best first time gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Received the product listed. The packaging was great. The company really cares about their product getting to their customers safe and in great condition. Plenty of room inside the case for upgrades and other additions. Doesn't make much sound which is great. Never have any problems with lag or anything. It runs really smoothly. The keyboard and the mouse they include is okay, but that's only an addition so I'm not complaining. I payed for the pc, not the mouse and keyboard. I have ran some benchmark tests and it does great. The temperature stays around 30 degrees. Haven't used VR yet but will update my review once I get a headset! Great product and really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Computer is a waste of MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This Computer is a waste of money just invest in the time of looking at building one from scratch or just purchasing a mac or a pc from a brand such as dell, hp etc. I had the computer for maybe 6 months before the visuals just crapped out on me, not to mention I can't even download Apex Legends without experiencing problems. The main one that gets me is this thing has 5 or 6 fans I believe and it overheats!! This is a complete waste of $818.00, 3/10. INCEST IN SOME REAL HARDWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: J_Grxxn

customer_reviews.title: Customer service rocked!
customer_reviews.text: This Pc is amazing for the price. My only concern with it is the reviews ive read about the power supply and mother board. The windows 10 key is bound to the mother board so do keep this in mind. I was able to get all the information for this computer through cyberpowerpcs customer support which far exceeded my expectations. Could not beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This PC is good for just getting into gaming. It can handle almost any game you throw at it. I have not tested Battlefield, but it can handle modded minecraft which is pretty intense. When I play battle royale games the fans get quite loud though. If you know someone who can build you a decent PC for about 200 more I would recommend going that path. But if you need something soon and are on a budget this PC will do the job,
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted this computer to work.  Had to return two units
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the build of the computer, this is a great deal. However, we had two different units sent to us, but had an issue where the screen would go black. I feel bad returning these, instead of Amazon being able to trouble shoot and help replace whatever component in the computer isn't working properly (video card most likely). But to Amazon's credit, they had no issue proving a replacement or refund for both purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Solid first time PC
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the computer world so I thought it would be best to get a pre-built instead of building my own for the sake of inexperience. It was definitely a good choice. For me, the sole reason for the computer is to play games and do some school work on it. I am not a game heavy person right now so this computer did just the trick to play my favorite games in very good quality. I have had this for about 2 months and no problems. Strongly recommend for anyone who wants to casually play their favorite games is amazing quality for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Max Shirvinski

customer_reviews.title: Runs games perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming desktop runs at great framerates! I got this computer for $650 and it is amazing! Normal price is around 750. Make sure you get the right model with the right graphics card. I love mine and currently put a 1070 in it. Hasn't broken or anything yet. I've had it since mid July. It would way more than 750 if you tried to build this, also you wouldn't have to deal with the troubles of building one. Believe me I've been there... I have the model with the i5 8400 CPU and RX 580 GPU, but I recently installed a GTX 1070.
customer_reviews.author: Stanislav G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beast!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it! I looked into building one because everyone said it's cheaper and you get more. Not true with this one! I spent weeks comparing different builds, but kept coming back to this because for what you get it came out cheaper than a build every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ackpfft

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level system
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price for someone who doesn't want to build their own computer, or wants a good foundation for building on. Would recommend getting extra ram for multitasking. The fans are very loud and cheap flimsy fans. Thinking about upgrading in the future.
customer_reviews.author: turbo200sx

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming pc.
customer_reviews.text: This computer is amazing. The only two downsides I see with the computer is ventilation and the power supply. The power supply is a 500w 80+ made by channel well technology. Channel well technology is the same brand that makes corsair PSU. The airflow is very limited with the front panel of the case. Which can cause the computer to over heat. But besides those two hiccups the computer is a monster for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Blew my mind
customer_reviews.text: At first when I Purchased this pc I was very skeptic about it, I didn’t believe that it could run games at ultra settings and even less at anything higher than 60fps. However I was surprised at how wrong I was, running R6S at 120fps, ultra settings. I love this pc. And with an added SSD and added RAM it has been a dream to use. If you are able to get the liquid cooled version of this PC I’d deffiently recomend it as it will save you some time and money on upgrading it later on.
customer_reviews.author: Juan L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price a great starter gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This is the first gaming PC and we are very happy with it. Both my kids 14 and 11 enjoy this. Please get a good monitor with this one to really enjoy the freesync Technology that comes with the graphic card
customer_reviews.author: Priya & Ganesh

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Paid hella money for this junk, can't even play Final fantasy with out lagging 3ven with graphic turn all the way down. Also the CPU running to hot. Had to change out CPU cooler and GPU card amd the ram. Everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Naruto

customer_reviews.title: best pc on the market for the cheapest price!!
customer_reviews.text: This PC is really high quality and awesome for how cheap the price is. If you're looking into investing in a gaming PC without breaking your pocket too much, this is what you need. This PC can run 60 fps. It has the new and improved 3.0 USB ports. The backside of the PC is very efficient having all sorts of different ports DVI, mini DVI , HDMI , USB you name it and its there very compatible with any type of cord that uses a certain port. This PC is the best one hurry and buy one now before its not on sale anymore
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Mayers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for sound!
customer_reviews.text: This may be good for gaming, but I got it to do music production. There is constant noise from the processor, and it is even worse when you move the mouse. I have tried changing all the cables, and adding ferrite beads to block noise. NOTHING works!! The noise is horrendous! I have given up trying to fix it and will be buying another PC.... I have attached a video showing the noise and what happens when you move the mouse.
customer_reviews.author: William Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: This CyberpowerPC has been a great purchase and so far nothing has gone wrong. It has a great GPU (RX 580) and a pretty nice CPU (i5 8400). It meets almost all requirements for above average gaming. It works great and comes with a nice keyboard and gaming mouse. The computer case is very nice and allows you to easily take off the clear panel to work with what is inside the tower. This review deserves 5 stars because it is phenomenal for gaming and is such a cheap price. You won't find gaming PC's much cheaper than this, and this one is amazing for it's price. I am a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: kgseador

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gaming PC. I was using a laptop before this, that could barely run any games. This PC is able to handle A LOT at ultra setting.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starting game rig
customer_reviews.text: First off, the customer service provided by Cyber Power was top notch. The computer has plenty of power to run most modern games at high settings. The included keyboard and mouse work great! Keep in mind this model does NOT include a disk drive (which I knew going in). For the price this computer can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice gaming PC for the right price for kids
customer_reviews.text: Buying a gaming PC is a big purchase for us. After researching and reading a lot of reviews, we decided on a basic model of CyberpowerPC, and Amazon's price was unbeatable. The PC looks very savvy and performs great. Kids love it, and it seems very well built. Looking forward to enjoying it for the next few years.
customer_reviews.author: Daxia

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: Coming up on two years of owning this PC, it's been nothing but great. Have not had a single problem and I've used it 6 out of 7 days a week since I got it, if not everyday. I Have had a plethora of games and not once has it struggled to run them, it's VR compatible if you didn't know! Plan on getting a VR headset soon. You get a great gaming computer and also a great daily computer to do any work you need for an extremely fair price. Highly recommend, Thanks Cyberpower!
customer_reviews.author: maddison

customer_reviews.title: Great PC!
customer_reviews.text: Overall an amazing PC, runs extremely smoothly and hardly even closely overheats with the amount of fans installed already! One thing though I recommend is that you buy a SSD with it if you're a gamer so you can put your games on it to run quicker on load up times. I also recommend to buy a Ethernet cord with it since it comes with a WiFi USB adapter which is alright but doesn't fully maximize your bandwidth usage. Overall though I highly recommend on buying this PC!!
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Would buy Again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This computer runs really nice with the highend graphics card. I bought this PC for my son he loves it. He’s always playing on Steam. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this computer for 2 days now and I already love it. It runs all of the games I want to play at a high frame rate. The value of this computer is also amazing. The specs are great for the money and you get an included keyboard and mouse. The mouse is great. It cycles through all the colors of the rainbow and feels good in the hand. The keyboard is eh but still a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Porter

customer_reviews.title: CYBERPOWERPC
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to set up and overall a great starter PC. I have been in the market for quite some time now and am not disappointed with purchasing this PC. My PC streams Fortnite, PUB, Discord, Candy Crush, and much more. It is easy to mod and has a unique look. The only thing I found disappointing about this product was the inability to change the LED light colors inside the desktop. However, the keyboard and mouse do change color. Overall I love this PC and am satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Utt

customer_reviews.title: Fast computer, happy son
customer_reviews.text: We bought this gaming PC for my son. His laptop had died and he convinced us to buy a faster computer he could play games on. After looking around and comparing some contenders, this seemed like a good value for the money. It arrived and was dead right out of the box, but customer service was great. Returning it was easy and a replacement came quickly. This time everything was perfect. It's fast and my son is thrilled. If it had arrived working the first time, and if my son's bedroom wasn't unbelievably hot (which he doesn't care about), I'd give this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Turbert

customer_reviews.title: I love my PC!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first actual gaming PC, and right out of the box, I loved it at first glance. Games like CSGO, Fortnite, Fallout 4 and 76, GTA V, and more demanding or triple a games run very smooth at high graphics. On GTA V, for example, I average 100/200 FPS with highest graphics setting, and no adjustments made to my computer. I highly recommend this PC to any newcomer to PC gaming, with a small budget.
customer_reviews.author: Laura O'Neal

product_meta.title: CyberpowerPC Gamer Xtreme GXIVR8020A5 Desktop Gaming PC (Intel i5-8400 6 Core Processor, AMD RX 580 4GB, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 1TB 7200RPM HDD, WiFi, Win 10 Home 64-bit), Black - VR Ready
product_meta.description: Destroy the competition with the CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Xtreme VR series of gaming desktops. The Gamer Xtreme VR series features the latest generation of high performance Intel Core processors and ultra-quick DDR RAM to easily handle system-intensive tasks, such as high definition video playback and gaming. Coupled with powerful discreet video cards, the Gamer Xtreme VR series provides a smooth gaming and multimedia experience.
feature_bullets: System: Intel Core i5-8400 2.8GHz 6 Core : Intel B360 Chipset, 8GB DDR4, 1TB HDD: Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-bit
Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB Video Card, 1x DVI, 1x HDMI, 2x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 6 x USB 3.1, 2 x USB 2.0, 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000: Audio: 7.1 Channel: Gaming Keyboard and Mouse
Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor Warranty: Free Lifetime Tech Support
NOTE: Refer the User Guide before use.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,427 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
